source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_SEQ_00<tab>Kal Myhk looks to be in a state of panic.

TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_SEQ_01<tab>Kal Myhk tells you his brother has been seriously injured. In the hopes of promoting a swift recovery, he wishes to keep his brother well fed. To that end, he asks that you help him hunt for food. Meet with Kal Myhk down at the river and be ready to hunt.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_SEQ_01<tab>Vous avez discuté avec Kal Myhk, qui vous a demandé de le rejoindre à la rivière Vairlame, dans l'Avant-pays dravanien. Il voudrait rapporter de la viande pour un de ses amis blessés.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_SEQ_02<tab>Kal Myhk plans to bring his brother both jagil and loaghtan meat, and needs your help. The loaghtans are known to graze up north, but he is forbidden from traveling so far upstream. He asks that you hunt one in his stead.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_SEQ_02<tab>Vous avez rejoint Kal Myhk, qui vous a demandé d'observer les alentours à l'endroit indiqué et de vaincre <var 33 ((BNpcName)) 02F20FD30202 /var> afin d'en prélever la viande.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_SEQ_03<tab>You slay a loaghtan and obtain its meat. Return south with your bounty and report your success to Kal Myhk.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_SEQ_03<tab>Vous avez obtenu <var 33 ((EventItem)) 02F61E8B5A0202 /var>. Allez rejoindre Kal Myhk au bord de la rivière Vairlame.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_SEQ_04<tab>Kal Myhk is quite pleased with your kill. With meat and fish in hand, he insists on going straight to his brother in Mourn.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_SEQ_04<tab>Kal Myhk vous a demandé de le suivre à Morne, dans l'Avant-pays dravanien, et de lui donner <var 33 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8B5A0202 /var> une fois arrivé<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> sur place.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_SEQ_05<tab>You arrive at Mourn and find Kal Myhk but a few steps inside. Next to him is his brother, lying motionless on the floor. Kal Myhk rouses him and offers him the fish and meat you procured. His brother refuses, and becoming aware of your presence, grows increasingly angry at the offering. He recalls the men who plucked him from the skies of Coerthas, nearly claiming his life. He warns Kal Myhk that no man can be trusted, and claims that you too will soon turn to betray him. Kal Myhk is at a loss for words, and quickly leaves the cave to consider his brother's words. Seek Kal Myhk near Anyx Trine, and see how he is handling this news.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_SEQ_05<tab>Vous avez remis <var 33 ((EventItem)) 03F61E8B5A0202 /var> à Kal Myhk, mais Ohl Ahs a refusé de manger ce que vous aviez rapporté pour lui. Le petit dragon a ensuite été très choqué d'apprendre que des êtres humains étaient res<var 16 /var>pon<var 16 /var>sa<var 16 /var>bles des blessures de son ami. Il était terrifié... Retrouvez-le à proximité d'Annexe Trine.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_SEQ_06<tab>You find Kal Myhk on the steps of Anyx Trine, a sullen look on his face. While he appreciates all you have done for him, it seems he would choose to heed his brother's warning.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_SEQ_06<tab>Vous avez retrouvé le petit dragon, qui a été pro<var 16 /var>fon<var 16 /var>dé<var 16 /var>ment ébranlé par l'histoire d'Ohl Ahs...

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_TODO_01<tab>Hunt a loaghtan at the specified location.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_TODO_01<tab>Observer les alentours à l'endroit indiqué et terrasser <var 33 ((BNpcName)) 02F20FD30202 /var>

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_TODO_03<tab>Hand Kal Myhk the slice of loaghtan shoulder.

target: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Il s'est passé quelque chose d'horrible<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_001<tab>Brother has been gravely injured. I fear he will not survive long in such a weakened state.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_001<tab>Il y a un dragon avec qui je joue toujours. Il est rentré très blessé l'autre jour et il n'a vraiment pas l'air d'aller bien...

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_002<tab>He must feed to regain his strength. Meet me at the river. We will gather food for him.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_002<tab>Je me suis dit que s'il mangeait quelque chose, ça devrait l'aider à reprendre des forces. Du coup, j'ai décidé de chasser, mais j'avoue que j'aurais bien besoin d'aide.
TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_003<tab>Tu te souviens de la rivière de l'autre fois<var 1D /var>? Je t'attendrai là-bas. Je serais vraiment très triste si tu me laissais tomber...

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_010<tab>Good, you are here. Let us hunt jagil and loaghtan. They are Brother's favorite, and easy prey besides.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_010<tab>Merci d'être venu<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var>. Je suis presque sûr qu'il y a <var 33 ((BNpcName)) 0AF20FD30302 /var> près de Loth ast Gnath. Tu me rendrais un sacré service si tu voulais bien en vaincre un.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_011<tab>The loaghtans graze north of here, but I am forbidden from traveling so far upstream. You must hunt one for me. I will remain here and hunt the jagil. Go swiftly.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_011<tab>Maman m'a dit que je ne devais jamais aller au-delà de cette rivière donc je vais me contenter de chasser ici en t'attendant. Je compte sur toi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_020<tab>They're known to graze to the north. Stay along the river, and look for one there.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_020<tab>Tu sais où c'est, Loth ast Gnath<var 1D /var>? C'est là-bas que tu devrais trouver <var 33 ((BNpcName)) 02F20FD30202 /var> à chasser.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_030<tab>You hunt well, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Good work. I too have caught a veritable bounty.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_030<tab>C'est un super beau morceau de <var 33 ((BNpcName)) 0DF20FD30202 /var> que tu m'as rapporté<var 1D /var>! Moi aussi, j'ai réussi à chasser beaucoup de gibier.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_031<tab>Quickly, let us take these to Brother. He rests just beyond the mouth of Mourn outside Anyx Trine.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_031<tab>On n'a plus qu'à rentrer à Morne pour donner tout ça à mon ami<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_040<tab>Give me the loaghtan meat. I will feed it to him.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_040<tab>C'est toi qui as rapporté la plus belle pièce. Ohl Ahs va être drôlement content<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_041<tab>Brother! I bring you food. Eat, and regain your strength.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_041<tab>Ohl Ahs, regarde, on t'a rapporté plein de bonnes choses. Tu as vu<var 1D /var>? <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> a même trouvé ta viande préférée<var 1D /var>! Mange, ça te permettra de reprendre des forces.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_OHLASH_000_042<tab>Kal, my brother. These wounds will not be mended by food. I must rest to─ Wait! Who is that with you? ...A man!? Why do you consort with this filth? Were these beasts slain by <var 08 E905 ((<var 1A 02 /var>her<var 1A 01 /var>)) ((<var 1A 02 /var>his<var 1A 01 /var>)) /var> hand?
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_OHLASH_000_042<tab>Kal, toute la viande du monde ne guérira pas mes blessures. Il me faut du repos... beaucoup de repos<var 1D /var>! En plus, tu veux que je mange ce que cet<var 08 E905 ((te)) (()) /var> humain<var 08 E905 ((e)) (()) /var> a chassé<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_OHLASH_000_043<tab>I will not demean myself by eating meat butchered by this creature. Who do you think dealt me these wounds but <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> kind!?
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_OHLASH_000_043<tab>Comment veux-tu que j'accepte quelque chose de l'un de ces humains<var 1D /var>!? Comment pourrais-je laisser la main qui m'a blessé hier me nourrir aujourd'hui<var 1D /var>! Tu te demandes ce qui m'est arrivé<var 1D /var>? Va le demander à ses amis les chevaliers<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_OHLASH_000_044<tab>We hunt for food, for the survival of our kind. But they hunt for blood─striking without hesitation, assuming all of our kind to be their enemy. Men howled and cheered as I fell into the snows of Coerthas. I was fortunate to escape with my life.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_OHLASH_000_044<tab>Ils m'ont pris en chasse, bien décidés à me tuer<var 1D /var>! Sais-tu quel était mon crime<var 1D /var>? J'ai osé survoler le Coerthas... Ces sales humains m'ont attaqué alors que je cherchais simplement de quoi me nourrir.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_OHLASH_000_045<tab>Men cannot be trusted. <var 1A 02 /var>None of them<var 1A 01 /var>! It is only a matter of time before even <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> turns on you.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_OHLASH_000_045<tab>Kal, tu ne devrais plus traîner avec ces monstres. Tu ne sais pas quand ils décideront de te tuer.
Aaah, comme ça fait mal...<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_046<tab>But <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> has been so kind to me. I don't understand...
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_046<tab>Je ne savais pas, Ohl Ahs... Comment des hommes ont-ils pu faire ça<var 1D /var>? J'ai eu tort de baisser ma garde. Les humains sont des créatures effrayantes.

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_047<tab>Excuse me. I... I need time to think on Brother's words.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_047<tab>Ah... J'oubliais que j'avais un truc à faire. On se reverra peut-être un jour... Au revoir<var 1D /var>!
TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_OHLASH_000_051<tab>Si tu touches à Kal, je te retrouverai... et je te tuerai<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_050<tab>Oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I have given thought to Brother's words, and... I'm sorry. You have been very kind, but he would not lie to me. I must ask that you leave.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ324_01816_KALMYHK_000_050<tab>Ah, c'est toi<var 1D /var>? Tu sais, Ohl Ahs ne serait pas content s'il nous voyait ensemble. Et puis bon, je... Bref, merci pour la viande.
